statements: DELETE FROM SoilNutrientAndCropYield WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Field A';
DELETE FROM CropYieldData WHERE id = 10 AND yield > 1000;
DELETE FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE nitrogen_level < 5.0 OR phosphorus_level > 10.0;
DELETE FROM FieldData WHERE field_name = 'Wheat Field';
DELETE FROM crop_yield_data WHERE yield_date < '2022-01-01' AND crop_name = 'Corn'
DELETE FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE location = 'Field A';
DELETE FROM SoilNutrientLevels WHERE location = 'Field A';
DELETE FROM CropYields WHERE season = 'Summer' AND yield < 1000;
